actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to study Cliff Walk in Newport, Rhode Island, including its appropriateness for inclusion as a unit of the National Park System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources and the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs on the appropriate means to ensure the continued preservation and public use of the historic Cliff Walk in Newport, Rhode Island, including the appropriateness of including it as a unit of the National Park System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to study Cliff Walk in Newport, Rhode Island, including its appropriateness for inclusion as a unit of the National Park System.
